name: Microsoft Access Signed Package
summary: Learn about .ACCDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ACCDC files allow users to distribute trusted database files over the Internet. After receiving an ACCDB file, you can import it back into Access by selecting File â†’ Open.... When importing the file, you will be prompted and asked whether or not you trust the signed certificate from the publisher.

description: A file with .accdc extension is a database package created with Microsoft Access and contains a digitally-signed database. Such type of files are usually created by signing an existing Microsoft Access Database file (i.e. ACCDB) for sending over the internet to other users. The signing of these files are meant to ensure the trust worthiness of these files recevied by end users. Microsoft Access is a relational Database Management system that is used to create and publish databases for use in desktop as well as web-based content management systems. ACCDC files can be opened with Microsoft Access as well as Office 365.

Packaged database file created by Microsoft Access, a desktop relational database management system (RDBMS) application; contains a digitally-signed database package that was created from an original .ACCDB database file.
